comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: Her foul mouth, and temper have been documented since Bill was governor of Arkansas. The msm has never mentioned it. And yes, many men do speak this way when they're with their buddies, or when they're trying to impress someone. I've seen plenty of women who are just as bad when they're with their friends. Excuse it, no, but crucify him over this, no. The media has been digging for something like this for 18 months. They have a vested interest in Hillary. DT still has my vote.

replies.author: Kendyl
replies.text: With Trump its just words.....With Bill Clinton it's RAPE! http://www.breitbart.com/2016-presidential-race/2016/10/09/breitbart-news-exclusive-video-interview-bill-clinton-accuser-juanita-broaddrick-breaks-describing-brutal-rapes/

replies.author: Tia
replies.text: The day has come when the most closed minded people have to face the truth. The facts are presented in this video proving that the Muslim Brotherhood has occupied America for over 25 years. Your Congressmen and Senators in both parties have swindled you, your children and grandchildren out of a future. It is a fact is that every voter has been controlled by an imposter two party system that is actually a rigged one party controlled by Elite treasonous criminals. Donald Trump upset their treasonous plan and must get elected not because a political party but because American lives depend upon it. This election is about a fight to save humanity. It does not matter if you are conservative or liberal…Hillary Clinton CANNOT be allowed into office. SHARE THIS LIKE YOUR LIFE, THE LIFE OF YOUR CHILDREN AND GRANDCHILDREN DEPEND ON IT… BECAUSE IT DOES. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ve9_WbYg9X0
